title: Stefanos Tsitsipas, So Near the Greats, but Not One of Them Yet
description: He has an impressive game, with a dominating serve and a huge wingspan. Winning a major is next on his list.
dc:creator: Cindy Shmerler
media:description: Stefanos Tsitsipas in August at the Western & Southern Open in Ohio, where he was the runner-up.
